selectClass.description: This will display the list of classes alongside the primary stat that the class uses.

rollStats.description: This will generate your Character some stats. If you like the stats, use !confirmStats. Note that this will prevent your stats from being modified by this command in the future. If you do not like your stats, simply use the command again.

classList.description: This will display the list of classes alongside the primary stat that the class uses.
